description.english: Make your first delivery and start your farming business with a bang!
description.german: Liefere deine erste Bestellung aus und starte dein Farming-Geschäft mit Schwung!
description.french: Effectue ta première livraison et lance ton activité agricole en beauté !
description.koreana: 첫 번째 배달을 완료하고 농장 사업을 힘차게 시작하세요!
description.spanish: Realiza tu primera entrega y comienza tu negocio agrícola con éxito.
description.schinese: 完成你的首次交付，开启你的农场生意！
description.tchinese: 完成你的首次交付，讓你的農場生意紅紅火火！
description.japanese: 最初の配達を完了し、農場ビジネスを華々しくスタートさせよう！
description.dutch: Doe je eerste levering en start je boerenbedrijf met een knal!
description.brazilian: Faça sua primeira entrega e comece seu negócio agrícola com tudo!

description.english: Complete your first quest and kickstart your farming adventure!
description.german: Schließe deine erste Quest ab und starte dein Farming-Abenteuer!
description.french: Accomplis ta première quête et commence ton aventure agricole !
description.koreana: 첫 번째 퀘스트를 완료하고 농장 모험을 시작하세요!
description.spanish: Completa tu primera misión y comienza tu aventura en la granja.
description.schinese: 完成你的第一个任务，开启你的农场冒险！
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一個任務，開啟你的農場冒險！
description.japanese: 最初のクエストを完了して、農場アドベンチャーを始めよう！
description.dutch: Voltooi je eerste zoektocht en begin je boerderijavontuur!
description.brazilian: Complete sua primeira missão e dê o pontapé inicial na sua aventura na fazenda!

description.english: You're leveling up fast! Reach XP Level 5 and keep growing your farming skills!
description.german: Du steigst schnell auf! Erreiche XP-Stufe 5 und entwickle deine Farming-Fähigkeiten weiter!
description.french: Tu montes rapidement en niveau ! Atteins le niveau XP 5 et continue d’améliorer tes compétences agricoles !
description.koreana: 빠르게 레벨업하고 있습니다! XP 레벨 5에 도달하여 농장 기술을 더욱 발전시키세요!
description.spanish: ¡Estás subiendo de nivel rápidamente! Alcanza el nivel 5 de XP y sigue mejorando tus habilidades agrícolas.
description.schinese: 你正在快速升级！达到 XP 等级 5，不断提升你的农场技能！
description.tchinese: 你正在快速升級！達到 XP 等級 5，不斷提升你的農場技能！
description.japanese: レベルアップが速いね！XPレベル5に到達して、農場スキルをどんどん伸ばそう！
description.dutch: Je stijgt snel in niveau! Bereik XP-niveau 5 en blijf je boerderijvaardigheden verbeteren!
description.brazilian: Você está subindo de nível rapidamente! Alcance o nível 5 de XP e continue aprimorando suas habilidades agrícolas!

description.english: Play the game for 3 consecutive days without missing a session.
description.german: Spiele das Spiel 3 Tage hintereinander, ohne eine Sitzung zu verpassen.
description.french: Joue au jeu pendant 3 jours consécutifs sans manquer une session.
description.koreana: 3일 연속으로 게임을 플레이하고 농장을 꾸준히 운영하세요.
description.spanish: Juega durante 3 días consecutivos sin perder una sesión.
description.schinese: 连续 3 天玩游戏，不错过任何一天。
description.tchinese: 連續 3 天遊玩遊戲，不間斷經營你的農場。
description.japanese: 3日連続でゲームをプレイし、1日も欠かさず続けよう。
description.dutch: Speel het spel 3 opeenvolgende dagen zonder een sessie te missen.
description.brazilian: Jogue por 3 dias consecutivos sem perder uma sessão.

description.english: Buy your first cow and let the dairy dreams begin!
description.german: Kaufe deine erste Kuh und starte deine Milchproduktion!
description.french: Achète ta première vache et lance-toi dans la production laitière !
description.koreana: 첫 번째 소를 구매하고 유제품 사업을 시작하세요!
description.spanish: Compra tu primera vaca y comienza tu negocio lechero.
description.schinese: 购买你的第一头奶牛，开启你的奶制品梦想！
description.tchinese: 購買你的第一頭奶牛，開啟你的乳製品夢想！
description.japanese: 最初の牛を購入して、酪農の夢を始めよう！
description.dutch: Koop je eerste koe en laat de zuiveldromen beginnen!
description.brazilian: Compre sua primeira vaca e comece sua jornada no mundo dos laticínios!

description.english: You've stacked up 1,300 golden coins! Looks like farming is paying off.
description.german: Du hast 1.300 Goldmünzen gesammelt! Sieht so aus, als würde sich das Farming lohnen.
description.french: Tu as accumulé 1 300 pièces d’or ! On dirait bien que l’agriculture rapporte.
description.koreana: 1,300골드 코인을 모았습니다! 농장이 번창하고 있군요.
description.spanish: ¡Has acumulado 1,300 monedas de oro! Parece que la granja está dando frutos.
description.schinese: 你已经积累了 1,300 枚金币！看起来农场经营得不错。
description.tchinese: 你已累積 1,300 枚金幣！看來你的農場經營得很成功。
description.japanese: 1,300ゴールドコインを貯めた！農業の成果がしっかり出ているね。
description.dutch: Je hebt 1.300 gouden munten gespaard! Het lijkt erop dat boeren loont.
description.brazilian: Você acumulou 1.300 moedas de ouro! Parece que a fazenda está dando lucro.

description.english: You've collected 160 diamonds! Your farm is sparkling with success.
description.german: Du hast 160 Diamanten gesammelt! Dein Hof funkelt vor Erfolg.
description.french: Tu as collecté 160 diamants ! Ta ferme brille de succès.
description.koreana: 160개의 다이아몬드를 모았습니다! 농장이 번쩍이는 성공의 길을 걷고 있어요.
description.spanish: Has recolectado 160 diamantes. ¡Tu granja brilla con éxito!
description.schinese: 你已经收集了 160 颗钻石！你的农场闪耀着成功的光芒。
description.tchinese: 你已收集 160 顆鑽石！你的農場閃耀著成功的光芒。
description.japanese: 160個のダイヤモンドを集めた！農場が輝く成功を収めているよ。
description.dutch: Je hebt 160 diamanten verzameld! Je boerderij straalt van succes.
description.brazilian: Você coletou 160 diamantes! Sua fazenda está brilhando com sucesso.

description.english: Craft 120 onboard power-ups and dominate your levels.
description.german: Erstelle 120 Power-ups auf dem Spielfeld und dominiere deine Level.
description.french: Crée 120 bonus sur le plateau et domine tes niveaux.
description.koreana: 보드에서 120개의 파워업을 제작하여 레벨을 지배하세요!
description.spanish: Crea 120 potenciadores en el tablero y domina tus niveles.
description.schinese: 在棋盘上制作 120 个强化道具，主宰你的关卡！
description.tchinese: 在棋盤上製作 120 個強化道具，掌控你的關卡！
description.japanese: ゲーム内で120個のパワーアップを作成して、レベルを制覇しよう！
description.dutch: Creëer 120 power-ups op het bord en domineer je levels.
description.brazilian: Crie 120 power-ups no tabuleiro e domine seus níveis.

description.english: Prove your skills by completing 50 orders in Challenge mode, only the toughest farmers succeed!
description.german: Beweise dein Können, indem du 50 Bestellungen im Herausforderungsmodus abschließt – nur die härtesten Farmer bestehen!
description.french: Prouve tes compétences en complétant 50 commandes en mode Défi – seuls les agriculteurs les plus aguerris y parviennent !
description.koreana: 도전 모드에서 50개의 주문을 완료하고 실력을 증명하세요! 최고의 농부만이 성공할 수 있습니다!
description.spanish: Demuestra tus habilidades completando 50 pedidos en el modo Desafío. ¡Solo los granjeros más duros lo lograrán!
description.schinese: 在挑战模式下完成 50 个订单，证明你的实力！只有最强的农场主才能成功！
description.tchinese: 在挑戰模式下完成 50 個訂單，證明你的實力！只有最強的農場主才能成功！
description.japanese: チャレンジモードで50件の注文を達成し、最高の農場経営者であることを証明しよう！
description.dutch: Bewijs je vaardigheden door 50 bestellingen te voltooien in de Uitdaging-modus – alleen de beste boeren slagen hierin!
description.brazilian: Prove suas habilidades completando 50 pedidos no modo Desafio. Só os fazendeiros mais habilidosos conseguem!

description.english: Complete 30 orders on Expert difficulty, only the best farmers can handle this!
description.german: Schließe 30 Bestellungen auf Experten-Schwierigkeit ab – nur die besten Farmer schaffen das!
description.french: Accomplis 30 commandes en difficulté Expert – seuls les meilleurs agriculteurs peuvent y arriver !
description.koreana: 전문가 난이도에서 30개의 주문을 완료하세요. 최고의 농부만이 해낼 수 있습니다!
description.spanish: Completa 30 pedidos en la dificultad Experto. ¡Solo los mejores pueden manejarlo!
description.schinese: 在专家模式下完成 30 个订单，只有最优秀的农场主才能做到！
description.tchinese: 在專家模式下完成 30 個訂單，只有最優秀的農場主才能做到！
description.japanese: エキスパートモードで30件の注文を達成し、一流の農場経営者になろう！
description.dutch: Voltooi 30 bestellingen op de Expert-moeilijkheid – alleen de beste boeren kunnen dit aan!
description.brazilian: Complete 30 pedidos na dificuldade Especialista. Só os melhores conseguem lidar com esse desafio!

description.english: Beat the clock and finish 30 Orders in Timed mode!
description.german: Besiege die Zeit und schließe 30 Bestellungen im Zeitmodus ab!
description.french: Bats le chrono et termine 30 commandes en mode Temps limité !
description.koreana: 시간과의 싸움에서 승리하고 제한 시간 모드에서 50개의 주문을 완료하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota al reloj y completa 30 pedidos en el modo con Tiempo!
description.schinese: 打败时钟，在限时模式下完成 30 个订单！
description.tchinese: 擊敗時鐘，在限時模式下完成 30 個訂單！
description.japanese: タイムモードで30件の注文を時間内に完了させよう！
description.dutch: Versla de klok en voltooi 30 bestellingen in de Tijdmodus!
description.brazilian: Vença o relógio e conclua 30 pedidos no modo Com Tempo!

description.english: Complete all 2 farm upgrades and modernize your land.
description.german: Schließe alle 2 Farm-Upgrades ab und modernisiere dein Land.
description.french: Effectue les 2 améliorations de la ferme et modernise tes terres.
description.koreana: 2단계 농장 업그레이드를 완료하고 농장을 현대화하세요.
description.spanish: Completa las 2 mejoras de la granja y moderniza tu terreno.
description.schinese: 完成 2 次农场升级，让你的土地现代化。
description.tchinese: 完成 2 次農場升級，讓你的土地現代化。
description.japanese: 全2回の農場アップグレードを完了し、農場を近代化しよう！
description.dutch: Voltooi alle 2 boerderij-upgrades en moderniseer je land.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as 2 melhorias da fazenda e modernize sua terra.

description.english: Harvest 150 crops and reap the rewards of a thriving farm!
description.german: Ernte 150 Feldfrüchte und genieße die Belohnungen einer blühenden Farm!
description.french: Récolte 150 cultures et savoure les fruits d’une ferme florissante !
description.koreana: 작물 150개를 수확하고 번영하는 농장의 보상을 받으세요!
description.spanish: Cosecha 150 cultivos y disfruta de las recompensas de una granja próspera.
description.schinese: 收获 150 株作物，享受农场蓬勃发展的回报！
description.tchinese: 收穫 150 株作物，享受農場蓬勃發展的回報！
description.japanese: 150個の作物を収穫し、活気あふれる農場の恩恵を受けよう！
description.dutch: Oogst 150 gewassen en pluk de vruchten van een bloeiende boerderij!
description.brazilian: Colha 150 plantações e aproveite as recompensas de uma fazenda próspera!

description.english: Complete 10 quests and show everyone you're a farming pro in the making.
description.german: Schließe 10 Quests ab und zeige allen, dass du ein aufstrebender Farming-Profi bist!
description.french: Accomplis 10 quêtes et prouve que tu es un futur expert en agriculture !
description.koreana: 퀘스트 10개를 완료하고 진정한 농부로 성장하고 있음을 증명하세요!
description.spanish: Completa 10 misiones y demuestra que te estás convirtiendo en un granjero profesional.
description.schinese: 完成 10 个任务，向所有人展示你正在成为一名专业农场主！
description.tchinese: 完成 10 個任務，向所有人展示你正在成為一名專業農場主！
description.japanese: 10個のクエストを完了して、一流の農場経営者への道を進もう！
description.dutch: Voltooi 10 zoektochten en laat zien dat je een boerderijprofessional in de maak bent!
description.brazilian: Complete 10 missões e mostre que você está se tornando um fazendeiro profissional!

description.english: Harvest fruit from 80 trees and enjoy the sweet rewards!
description.german: Ernte Früchte von 80 Bäumen und genieße die süßen Belohnungen!
description.french: Récolte des fruits sur 80 arbres et profite des douces récompenses !
description.koreana: 과일나무 80그루에서 열매를 수확하고 달콤한 보상을 받으세요!
description.spanish: Cosecha frutas de 80 árboles y disfruta de sus dulces recompensas.
description.schinese: 从 80 棵树上收获水果，享受甜美的奖励！
description.tchinese: 從 80 棵樹上收穫水果，享受甜美的獎勵！
description.japanese: 80本の木から果物を収穫し、甘い報酬を手に入れよう！
description.dutch: Oogst fruit van 80 bomen en geniet van de zoete beloningen!
description.brazilian: Colha frutas de 80 árvores e aproveite os doces frutos do seu trabalho!

description.english: Delete an item from the barn to optimize your storage.
description.german: Lösche ein Objekt aus der Scheune, um deinen Speicherplatz zu optimieren.
description.french: Supprime un objet de la grange pour optimiser ton espace de stockage.
description.koreana: 창고에서 아이템을 삭제하여 저장 공간을 최적화하세요.
description.spanish: Elimina un objeto del granero para optimizar el almacenamiento.
description.schinese: 从谷仓中删除一个物品，以优化存储空间。
description.tchinese: 從穀倉中刪除一個物品，以優化存儲空間。
description.japanese: 納屋からアイテムを削除して、保管スペースを最適化しよう。
description.dutch: Verwijder een item uit de schuur om je opslag te optimaliseren.
description.brazilian: Exclua um item do celeiro para otimizar seu armazenamento.

description.english: Snip, snip! Harvest 50 flowers and make your farm bloom like never before!
description.german: Schnipp, schnapp! Ernte 50 Blumen und lass deine Farm erblühen wie nie zuvor!
description.french: Cisaille, cisaille ! Récolte 50 fleurs et fais fleurir ta ferme comme jamais !
description.koreana: 슥슥! 꽃 50개를 수확하고 농장을 아름답게 꽃피우세요!
description.spanish: ¡Corte, corte! Cosecha 50 flores y haz que tu granja florezca como nunca.
description.schinese: 咔嚓，咔嚓！收获 50 朵花，让你的农场绽放前所未有的光彩！
description.tchinese: 咔嚓，咔嚓！收穫 50 朵花，讓你的農場綻放前所未有的光彩！
description.japanese: チョキチョキ！50本の花を収穫し、農場を美しく彩ろう！
description.dutch: Knip, knip! Oogst 50 bloemen en laat je boerderij bloeien als nooit tevoren!
description.brazilian: Corte, corte! Colha 50 flores e faça sua fazenda florescer como nunca antes!

description.english: You've stacked up 2,600 golden coins! Your farm is thriving, and so is your wallet.
description.german: Du hast 2.600 Goldmünzen gesammelt! Deine Farm floriert – und dein Geldbeutel auch.
description.french: Tu as accumulé 2 600 pièces d’or ! Ta ferme prospère, et ton portefeuille aussi.
description.koreana: 2,600골드 코인을 모았습니다! 농장이 번창하고 있고, 지갑도 두둑해졌어요!
description.spanish: Has acumulado 2,600 monedas de oro. ¡Tu granja prospera, y tu bolsillo también!
description.schinese: 你已经积累了 2,600 枚金币！你的农场繁荣，你的钱袋也鼓起来了！
description.tchinese: 你已累積 2,600 枚金幣！你的農場興旺，你的錢袋也鼓起來了！
description.japanese: 2,600ゴールドコインを貯めた！農場も財布も絶好調！
description.dutch: Je hebt 2.600 gouden munten gespaard! Je boerderij bloeit, en je portemonnee ook.
description.brazilian: Você acumulou 2.600 moedas de ouro! Sua fazenda está prosperando, e seu bolso também.

description.english: Your farm is bursting with color. Have 20 flower fields on the farmland!
description.german: Deine Farm explodiert vor Farben. Besitze 20 Blumenfelder auf deinem Hof!
description.french: Ta ferme est éclatante de couleurs. Possède 20 champs de fleurs sur tes terres !
description.koreana: 농장이 색색의 꽃들로 가득 찼어요. 농장에 꽃밭 20개를 조성하세요!
description.spanish: Tu granja está llena de color. ¡Ten 20 campos de flores en tus tierras!
description.schinese: 你的农场色彩斑斓！在农田上种植 20 片花田！
description.tchinese: 你的農場色彩繽紛！在農田上種植 20 片花田！
description.japanese: 農場がカラフルに！農場に花畑を20個配置しよう！
description.dutch: Je boerderij barst van de kleur. Heb 20 bloembedden op je boerderij!
description.brazilian: Sua fazenda está cheia de vida! Tenha 20 campos de flores na propriedade!

description.english: Complete 20 quests and prove you've got what it takes to run a thriving farm.
description.german: Schließe 20 Quests ab und beweise, dass du das Zeug hast, eine florierende Farm zu führen.
description.french: Accomplis 20 quêtes et prouve que tu as ce qu’il faut pour gérer une ferme prospère.
description.koreana: 20개의 퀘스트를 완료하고 성공적인 농장을 운영할 자격이 있음을 증명하세요.
description.spanish: Completa 20 misiones y demuestra que tienes lo necesario para administrar una granja exitosa.
description.schinese: 完成 20 个任务，证明你有能力经营一个繁荣的农场。
description.tchinese: 完成 20 個任務，證明你有能力經營一個繁榮的農場。
description.japanese: 20個のクエストを完了し、一流の農場経営者であることを証明しよう！
description.dutch: Voltooi 20 zoektochten en bewijs dat je het in je hebt om een succesvolle boerderij te runnen.
description.brazilian: Complete 20 missões e prove que você tem o que é preciso para administrar uma fazenda de sucesso.

description.english: Your farm is thriving! Reach XP Level 12 and show everyone you've got the skills to grow big!
description.german: Deine Farm floriert! Erreiche XP-Stufe 12 und zeige allen, dass du das Talent hast, groß zu werden!
description.french: Ta ferme prospère ! Atteins le niveau XP 12 et prouve que tu as le talent pour réussir !
description.koreana: 농장이 활기차게 성장하고 있어요! XP 레벨 12에 도달하여 실력을 증명하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Tu granja está floreciendo! Alcanza el nivel 12 de XP y demuestra que tienes talento para el crecimiento.
description.schinese: 你的农场蒸蒸日上！达到 XP 等级 12，向所有人展示你的成长能力！
description.tchinese: 你的農場蒸蒸日上！達到 XP 等級 12，向所有人展示你的成長能力！
description.japanese: 農場は順調に発展中！XPレベル12に到達し、大きく成長する準備を整えよう！
description.dutch: Je boerderij bloeit! Bereik XP-niveau 12 en laat zien dat je de vaardigheden hebt om groot te worden!
description.brazilian: Sua fazenda está prosperando! Alcance o nível 12 de XP e mostre a todos que você tem talento para crescer!

description.english: You've come a long way, farmer! Reach XP Level 23 and show off your farming expertise!
description.german: Du hast einen weiten Weg zurückgelegt, Farmer! Erreiche XP-Stufe 23 und zeige deine Farming-Expertise!
description.french: Tu as parcouru un long chemin, agriculteur ! Atteins le niveau XP 23 et montre ton expertise agricole !
description.koreana: 긴 여정을 걸어왔군요, 농부님! XP 레벨 23에 도달하여 농업 전문성을 과시하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Has recorrido un largo camino, granjero! Alcanza el nivel 23 de XP y presume de tu experiencia agrícola.
description.schinese: 你已经走了很长一段路，农场主！达到 XP 等级 23，展示你的农业专业技能！
description.tchinese: 你已經走了很長一段路，農場主！達到 XP 等級 23，展示你的農業專業技能！
description.japanese: 素晴らしい成長を遂げたね！XPレベル23に到達し、農場経営の実力を示そう！
description.dutch: Je hebt een lange weg afgelegd, boer! Bereik XP-niveau 23 en toon je landbouwexpertise!
description.brazilian: Você percorreu um longo caminho, fazendeiro! Alcance o nível 23 de XP e exiba sua experiência agrícola!

description.english: Produce 3 feed at the same time and keep your animals happy and well-fed
description.german: Produziere 3 Futter gleichzeitig und halte deine Tiere glücklich und gut versorgt.
description.french: Produis 3 sacs de nourriture en même temps et garde tes animaux heureux et bien nourris.
description.koreana: 한 번에 3개의 사료를 생산하여 동물들이 건강하고 행복하게 지낼 수 있도록 하세요!
description.spanish: Produce 3 piensos al mismo tiempo y mantén felices y bien alimentados a tus animales.
description.schinese: 同时生产 3 份饲料，让你的动物保持健康快乐！
description.tchinese: 同時生產 3 份飼料，讓你的動物保持健康快樂！
description.japanese: 3つのエサを同時に生産し、動物たちを幸せにしよう！
description.dutch: Produceer 3 zakken voer tegelijk en houd je dieren blij en goed gevoed.
description.brazilian: Produza 3 rações ao mesmo tempo e mantenha seus animais felizes e bem alimentados.

displayName.french: Comme un Cochon dans la Boue

description.english: Buy your first pig and get ready for some crispy, sizzling bacon!
description.german: Kaufe dein erstes Schwein und mach dich bereit für knusprigen, brutzelnden Speck!
description.french: Achète ton premier cochon et prépare-toi pour du bon bacon croustillant !
description.koreana: 첫 번째 돼지를 구매하고 바삭한 베이컨을 기대하세요!
description.spanish: Compra tu primer cerdo y prepárate para un delicioso y crujiente tocino.
description.schinese: 购买你的第一头猪，准备好享受香脆美味的培根吧！
description.tchinese: 購買你的第一頭豬，準備好享受香脆美味的培根吧！
description.japanese: 最初のブタを購入し、ジューシーで美味しいベーコン作りを始めよう！
description.dutch: Koop je eerste varken en maak je klaar voor knapperige, sappige bacon!
description.brazilian: Compre seu primeiro porco e prepare-se para muito bacon crocante e saboroso!

description.english: You've got yourself an alpaca! Get ready for the fluffiest wool in town!
description.german: Du hast dir ein Alpaka zugelegt! Mach dich bereit für die flauschigste Wolle der Stadt!
description.french: Tu as un alpaga ! Prépare-toi à produire la laine la plus douce de la région !
description.koreana: 알파카를 얻었어요! 가장 부드러운 양털을 수확할 준비를 하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Conseguiste una alpaca! Prepárate para la lana más esponjosa de la ciudad.
description.schinese: 你拥有了一只羊驼！准备迎接最柔软的羊毛吧！
description.tchinese: 你擁有了一隻羊駝！準備迎接最柔軟的羊毛吧！
description.japanese: アルパカを手に入れた！最高に柔らかいウールを準備しよう！
description.dutch: Je hebt een alpaca! Maak je klaar voor de zachtste wol in de regio!
description.brazilian: Você conseguiu uma alpaca! Prepare-se para a lã mais fofinha da cidade!

description.english: Sweet deal! Your first beehive is buzzing with life—get ready for golden honey!
description.german: Ein süßes Geschäft! Dein erster Bienenstock summt vor Leben – mach dich bereit für goldenen Honig!
description.french: Quelle bonne affaire ! Ta première ruche bourdonne de vie – prépare-toi à récolter du miel doré !
description.koreana: 달콤한 거래! 첫 번째 벌집이 생겼어요—이제 황금빛 꿀을 채집할 시간입니다!
description.spanish: ¡Gran trato! Tu primera colmena está llena de vida. ¡Prepárate para la miel dorada!
description.schinese: 好买卖！你的第一个蜂巢充满了活力——准备收获金黄的蜂蜜！
description.tchinese: 好買賣！你的第一個蜂巢充滿了活力——準備收穫金黃的蜂蜜！
description.japanese: 素晴らしい取引！最初のミツバチの巣が活気づいているよ！美味しいハチミツの準備をしよう！
description.dutch: Geweldige deal! Je eerste bijenkorf zoemt van het leven – bereid je voor op gouden honing!
description.brazilian: Ótima aquisição! Sua primeira colmeia está cheia de vida—prepare-se para o mel dourado!

description.english: Buy a Dog House and interact with the dog to hear it bark
description.german: Kaufe eine Hundehütte und interagiere mit dem Hund, um ihn bellen zu hören.
description.french: Achète une niche et interagis avec le chien pour l’entendre aboyer.
description.koreana: 강아지 집을 구매하고 강아지와 상호 작용하여 짖는 소리를 들어보세요.
description.spanish: Compra una Casa para Perro e interactúa con el perro para escuchar su ladrido.
description.schinese: 购买狗屋，并与狗互动，听听它的叫声。
description.tchinese: 購買狗屋，並與狗互動，聽聽它的叫聲。
description.japanese: 犬小屋を購入して、犬と交流して鳴き声を聞こう！
description.dutch: Koop een hondenhok en interacteer met de hond om hem te horen blaffen.
description.brazilian: Compre uma Casinha de Cachorro e interaja com o cão para ouvir seu latido.

description.english: Buy a Cat House and interact with the cat to hear it meow
description.german: Kaufe ein Katzenhaus und interagiere mit der Katze, um ihr Miauen zu hören.
description.french: Achète une maison pour chat et interagis avec le chat pour l’entendre miauler.
description.koreana: 고양이 집을 구매하고 고양이와 상호 작용하여 귀여운 울음소리를 들어보세요.
description.spanish: Compra una Casa para Gatos e interactúa con el gato para escucharlo maullar.
description.schinese: 购买猫屋，并与猫互动，听听它的喵喵声。
description.tchinese: 購買貓屋，並與貓互動，聽聽它的喵喵聲。
description.japanese: 猫の家を購入して、猫と交流して鳴き声を聞こう！
description.dutch: Koop een kattenhuis en interacteer met de kat om haar te horen miauwen.
description.brazilian: Compre uma Casinha de Gato e interaja com o gato para ouvir seu miado.

description.english: Deliver 30 orders and keep your customers happy.
description.german: Liefere 30 Bestellungen aus und halte deine Kunden glücklich.
description.french: Livrer 30 commandes et garde tes clients heureux.
description.koreana: 30개의 주문을 배달하고 고객들을 만족시키세요.
description.spanish: Entrega 30 pedidos y mantén a tus clientes felices.
description.schinese: 完成 30 份订单，让你的顾客满意。
description.tchinese: 完成 30 份訂單，讓你的顧客滿意。
description.japanese: 30件の注文を届けて、顧客を満足させよう！
description.dutch: Lever 30 bestellingen en houd je klanten tevreden.
description.brazilian: Entregue 30 pedidos e mantenha seus clientes felizes.

description.english: Reach the milestone of delivering 90 orders.
description.german: Erreiche den Meilenstein von 90 ausgelieferten Bestellungen.
description.french: Atteins le jalon des 90 commandes livrées.
description.koreana: 90개의 주문 배달을 완료하고 배달의 신이 되세요.
description.spanish: Llega al hito de 90 pedidos entregados.
description.schinese: 达到 90 份订单交付的里程碑。
description.tchinese: 達到 90 份訂單交付的里程碑。
description.japanese: 90件の注文を届けるという大きな節目を達成しよう！
description.dutch: Bereik de mijlpaal van 90 geleverde bestellingen.
description.brazilian: Atinja o marco de 90 pedidos entregues.

description.english: Sell 3 farm items that you purchased.
description.german: Verkaufe 3 Farm-Artikel, die du gekauft hast.
description.french: Vends 3 articles de ferme que tu as achetés.
description.koreana: 구매한 농장 아이템 3개를 판매하세요.
description.spanish: Vende 3 artículos de la granja que hayas comprado.
description.schinese: 出售 3 件你购买的农场物品。
description.tchinese: 出售 3 件你購買的農場物品。
description.japanese: 購入した農場アイテムを3つ売却しよう！
description.dutch: Verkoop 3 boerderijartikelen die je hebt gekocht.
description.brazilian: Venda 3 itens da fazenda que você comprou.

description.english: Buy every animal coop available in the game.
description.german: Kaufe jeden verfügbaren Tierstall im Spiel.
description.french: Achète tous les enclos pour animaux disponibles dans le jeu.
description.koreana: 게임에서 제공하는 모든 동물 우리를 구매하세요.
description.spanish: Compra todos los refugios de animales disponibles en el juego.
description.schinese: 购买游戏中所有可用的动物棚。
description.tchinese: 購買遊戲中所有可用的動物棚。
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべての動物小屋を購入しよう！
description.dutch: Koop elk dierenverblijf dat beschikbaar is in het spel.
description.brazilian: Compre todos os abrigos de animais disponíveis no jogo.

description.english: You've collected 250 diamonds! Your farm is shining brighter than ever.
description.german: Du hast 250 Diamanten gesammelt! Deine Farm glänzt heller als je zuvor.
description.french: Tu as collecté 250 diamants ! Ta ferme brille plus que jamais.
description.koreana: 250개의 다이아몬드를 모았습니다! 농장이 그 어느 때보다 빛나고 있어요!
description.spanish: Has recolectado 250 diamantes. ¡Tu granja brilla más que nunca!
description.schinese: 你已经收集了 250 颗钻石！你的农场比以往更加闪耀！
description.tchinese: 你已收集 250 顆鑽石！你的農場比以往更加閃耀！
description.japanese: 250個のダイヤモンドを集めた！農場がこれまで以上に輝いているよ！
description.dutch: Je hebt 250 diamanten verzameld! Je boerderij straalt helderder dan ooit.
description.brazilian: Você coletou 250 diamantes! Sua fazenda está brilhando mais do que nunca.

description.english: Feed 3 animals simultaneously and watch them thrive.
description.german: Füttere 3 Tiere gleichzeitig und sieh zu, wie sie gedeihen.
description.french: Nourris 3 animaux en même temps et observe-les s’épanouir.
description.koreana: 동물 3마리를 동시에 먹이고 그들이 번성하는 모습을 지켜보세요.
description.spanish: Alimenta a 3 animales al mismo tiempo y observa cómo prosperan.
description.schinese: 同时喂养 3 只动物，看着它们茁壮成长。
description.tchinese: 同時餵養 3 隻動物，看著它們茁壯成長。
description.japanese: 3匹の動物に同時にエサを与え、元気に育てよう！
description.dutch: Voer 3 dieren tegelijkertijd en zie ze floreren.
description.brazilian: Alimente 3 animais ao mesmo tempo e veja-os prosperar.

displayName.japanese: センスの良いデコレーター

description.english: Purchase at least half of the available decorations for your farm.
description.german: Kaufe mindestens die Hälfte der verfügbaren Dekorationen für deine Farm.
description.french: Achète au moins la moitié des décorations disponibles pour ta ferme.
description.koreana: 농장을 더 아름답게 꾸미기 위해 전체 장식품의 절반 이상을 구매하세요.
description.spanish: Compra al menos la mitad de las decoraciones disponibles para tu granja.
description.schinese: 购买至少一半可用的装饰品，为你的农场增添个性。
description.tchinese: 購買至少一半可用的裝飾品，為你的農場增添個性。
description.japanese: 農場の装飾を半分以上購入しよう！
description.dutch: Koop minstens de helft van de beschikbare decoraties voor je boerderij.
description.brazilian: Compre pelo menos metade das decorações disponíveis para sua fazenda.

description.english: Go all out and buy every decoration to make your farm unique.
description.german: Geh aufs Ganze und kaufe jede Dekoration, um deine Farm einzigartig zu machen.
description.french: Donne tout et achète toutes les décorations pour rendre ta ferme unique.
description.koreana: 모든 장식품을 구매하여 나만의 특별한 농장을 만드세요!
description.spanish: Ve más allá y compra todas las decoraciones para hacer que tu granja sea única.
description.schinese: 全力以赴，购买所有装饰品，让你的农场独一无二！
description.tchinese: 全力以赴，購買所有裝飾品，讓你的農場獨一無二！
description.japanese: すべての装飾を購入し、農場を自分だけの特別な空間にしよう！
description.dutch: Ga helemaal los en koop alle decoraties om je boerderij uniek te maken.
description.brazilian: Vá além e compre todas as decorações para tornar sua fazenda única.

description.english: Plant every type of tree possible to create a lush farm.
description.german: Pflanze jede Baumart, um eine üppige Farm zu erschaffen.
description.french: Plante chaque type d’arbre pour créer une ferme verdoyante.
description.koreana: 모든 유형의 나무를 심어 울창한 농장을 조성하세요.
description.spanish: Planta todos los tipos de árboles posibles y transforma tu granja en un paraíso verde.
description.schinese: 种植所有类型的树木，让你的农场变成郁郁葱葱的天堂。
description.tchinese: 種植所有類型的樹木，讓你的農場變成綠意盎然的天堂。
description.japanese: 農場に植えられるすべての木を植えて、緑豊かな農場を作ろう！
description.dutch: Plant elk type boom om een weelderige boerderij te creëren.
description.brazilian: Plante todos os tipos de árvores disponíveis e transforme sua fazenda em um paraíso verde.
